title: card.location.mode Response Application Programming Interface (API) Schema

seconds.description: If specified, the periodic sample interval.

lat.description: If geofence is enabled, the geofence center latitude in degrees.

lon.description: If geofence is enabled, the geofence center longitude in degrees.

max.description: If geofence is enabled, the meters from geofence center.

minutes.description: If geofence is enabled, the currently configured geofence debounce period.

threshold.description: When in periodic mode, the number of motion events (registered by the built-in accelerometer) required to trigger GPS to turn on.

samples.title: Location Mode Response
samples.description: Example response showing current location mode configuration.
